definition: to be shattered/to be annihilated (of hope, illusions etc)
broken/damaged/worn out/lousy/rotten/to break, split or cleave/to get rid of/to destroy/to break with/to defeat/to capture (a city etc)/to expose the truth of
to extinguish or put out/to go out (of a fire etc)/to exterminate or wipe out/to drown

sentences.english: Life creates itself in delirium and is undone in ennui.
sentences.chinese: 生命自創於狂亂，破滅於厭倦中。

sentences.english: Her fond dreams were bedashed at last.
sentences.chinese: 她的黃粱美夢最後破滅了。

sentences.english: Her hopes were quickly snuffed out.
It's the final gasp of the burst housing bubble.
sentences.chinese: 它是房地產泡沫破滅前的最後一次喘息。

sentences.english: His hopes were crushed by the chairman's remarks.
sentences.chinese: 主席的一席話使他的希望破滅了。

sentences.english: All hopes of a peaceful settlement were destroyed by the bomb.
sentences.chinese: 這個爆炸事件使一切和平解決的希望都破滅了。

sentences.english: The bubble has now burst and hedge funds will be decimated.
sentences.chinese: 現在，泡沫已經破滅了，對沖基金將開始大量倒閉。
他們的一切希望都破滅了。

sentences.english: But evanescence has never let go of fantasy.
sentences.chinese: 破滅卻從不把幻想放過。

sentences.english: Has the bubble burst for the yellow metal?
sentences.chinese: 關於這種黃澄澄金屬的泡沫破滅了嗎？

sentences.english: Coverdale quickly becomes disillusioned with farm work.
sentences.chinese: 科弗代爾對農業勞動的幻想很快就破滅了。

sentences.english: The super powersattempt to redivide the world failed.
sentences.chinese: 列強企圖重新瓜分世界的計劃破滅了。

sentences.english: Another study published this year also shatters some myths about autism.
sentences.chinese: 這一年公佈的另一項研究也使一些孤獨症神話破滅了。

sentences.english: It's ideal to augment the bust and stylize the abdomen.
sentences.chinese: 這是理想的破滅，以加強和風格化的腹部。

sentences.english: And daydreams shatter in your hand
sentences.chinese: 白日夢破滅在你自己手裏。

sentences.english: And so Knute's bright dream broke into little pieces.
sentences.chinese: 這樣他的夢想便破滅了。
